title: Aw Kalvari tlang chungah chuan
lyrics:
Aw, Kalvari tlang chuangah chuan,
Ka Lalpa duh tak an khengbet;
Ka tan a thisen a chhuak ta,
Chutah ngaihdamna kim a awm.

Aw, Kalvari tlang thim takah,
Chutah ka tan thisen a chhuak;
Aw, Kalvari malsawmsakna,
Chutah ka Chhandamtu a thi.

Lungpui khi, van a thim a,
A lu a kun, a nun a thlah,
Chhandamna kawng a rawn hawng ta,
Van lawmnate, chatuan thlengin,.

Aw, Lal Isu, engtin nge ni,
Ka tan i nunna i pek chu?
Kraws chu puin i lo awm ta,
I thlaphanna Kalvariah
